title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 820.6 - Information and assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 820.6 - Information and assistance

State Regulations

Any employer may request further information or assistance
regarding these regulations or compliance therewith by contacting the Bureau of

Toxic Substance Assessment of the New York State Department of

Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
820.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
